Package com.dji.GSDemo.GoogleMap.Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllflightAct
    Activity to show all previous flights that were saved on firestore, user can choose a specific flight and check the info or picture that were taken during that flight
    ConnectionActivity
    Used to connect the user to the app using a google account, the email will be saved for future uses of the app and uploading of flights to firestore, user can go to Allflight activity to check previous flights or make a new flight while using the drone
    MainActivity
    Activity of flight, will automatically be opened when choosing a new flight in Allflight Activity
    MyFlight
    Shows info and pictures of a specific flight, the flight is chosen from list of previous flights that were saved on firestore
    SaveAct
    Used to save the flight and upload to firestore, will be opened once the user pressed on saving the flight in bottom menu of MainActivity
    Splash
    First activity, Checks if user has signed to the app using a google account, will move to ConnectionActivity after 2 seconds
